description: Purchase Request from Agriculture and Agri-Food for a no-till seeder to be used in research plots and field renovations
tags: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement**

**Contract Title**
01800-240124 No Till Seeder

**Reference Number**
WS4245369082-Doc4284985618

**Contracting Authority**
Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage
Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5, Canada

**End User**
Department of Agriculture and Agri-Food (AAFC)
K.W. Neatby Bldg, 960 Carling Ave, Ottawa, Ontario K1Y4X2, Canada

**Procurement Details**

* **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal (RFP)
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive Open Bidding
* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price
* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Regions of Opportunity**: None specified
* **Regions of Delivery**: Newfoundland and Labrador

**Deadline**

The tender closing date is November 30, 2023, at 14:00:00 (local time).

**Contract Duration**
The expected start date of the contract is November 30, 2023, with no specified end date.

**Contract Description**
The Department of Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada, St. John’s Research and Development Centre (SJRDC), requires a 10-foot no-till seeder for research and field renovations. The delivered goods must be received on or before March 31, 2024. This procurement is conditionally limited to Canadian goods. 

**Contact Information**
For further information or to submit a proposal, please refer to the solicitation document at the link below:
https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17877724?extsite=MTc4Nzc3MjRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==. Alternatively, you may contact:
Maryse Cyr, SPAC/PSPC
maryse.cyr@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

Note:
* Unspsc code: 21101500
* Unspsc description: Agricultural machinery for soil preparation.  *Machine agricole pour la préparation des sols
* Procurement category: Government of Canada (GD)
* Regions of Delivery: Newfoundland and Labrador 
* Notice URL: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17877724?extsite=MTc4Nzc3MjRfQU4wMTQ4NDA
